sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"义务"或"职责"之意。
means: duty ： 指按道德和法律的标准，一个人永远要尽的义务，强调自觉性。
obligation ： 指道义上或法律上对他人的义务，强调强制性。也指因作出承诺而被迫履行的某种义务。
responsibility ： 指任何义务、职责、责任或职务上所尽的本分，强调对他人的责任。
function ： 指因职务或职业关系去履行某种职责。

sentence.Network_en: Co-operation was more than just an attractive option, it was an obligation.
sentence.Network_cn: 合作不仅仅是诱人的选择，它也是一种责任。

sentence.Network_en: They felt under no obligation to maintain their employees.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们觉得没有义务为员工提供生活费。

sentence.Network_en: When teachers assign homework, students usually feel an obligation to do it.
sentence.Network_cn: 当老师布置家庭作业的时候，学生们通常觉得做作业是分内之事。

jx.jx_en_mean: (in the Roman Catholic Church) a day on which all are required to attend Mass
jx.jx_cn_mean: （罗马天主教）所有的人都必须出席做弥撒的日子

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'formal promise'): via Old French from Latin obligatio(n-), from the verb obligare (see oblige)

entry.def: If you have an obligation to do something, it is your duty to do that thing.

example.ex: When teachers assign homework, students usually feel an obligation to do it...
example.tran: 老师布置作业时，学生通常认为完成作业是一种义务。

example.ex: Ministers are under no obligation to follow the committee's recommendations.
example.tran: 部长不必非得听从委员会的建议。

entry.tran: (照顾某人或保护某人利益的)义务，责任
entry.def: If you have an obligation to a person, it is your duty to look after them or protect their interests.

example.ex: The United States will do that which is necessary to meet its obligations to its own citizens...
example.tran: 美国将为自己的公民尽其应尽的义务。

example.ex: I have an ethical and a moral obligation to my client.
example.tran: 我对我的当事人负有道义上的责任。

entry.tran: (广告中产品或服务)免费试用地，免费体验地
entry.def: In advertisements, if a product or a service is available without obligation, you do not have to pay for that product or service until you have tried it and are satisfied with it.

example.ex: If you are selling your property, why not call us for a free valuation without obligation?...
example.tran: 如果您打算出售房产，何不打电话让我们作免费估价呢？

example.ex: You can review your policy in detail for a full 15 days without obligation.
example.tran: 您可以在15天的免费体验期内仔细审核保单细则。

means.word_mean: 1. the social force that binds you to your obligations and the courses of action demanded by that force;

sentences.sentence: "we must instill a sense of duty in our children"
"every right implies a responsibility; every opportunity, an obligation; every possession, a duty"- John D.Rockefeller Jr

means.word_mean: 2. the state of being obligated to do or pay something;

sentences.sentence: "he is under an obligation to finish the job"

means.word_mean: 3. a personal relation in which one is indebted for a service or favor
4. a legal agreement specifying a payment or action and the penalty for failure to comply

auth_sentence.content: We 've an obligation to correct such erroneous streotypes.
auth_sentence.res_content: We 've an obligation to correct such erroneous streotypes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We 've an obligation to correct such erroneous streotypes.

auth_sentence.content: The next President has an obligation to change things.
auth_sentence.res_content: The next President has an obligation to change things.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The next President has an obligation to change things.

auth_sentence.content: What obligation do reporters have to consider national-security concerns?
auth_sentence.res_content: What obligation do reporters have to consider national-security concerns?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What obligation do reporters have to consider national-security concerns?

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"某种物,用品;人等"; 2. 表名词,"动作或状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: accord和谐+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.手风琴
carr=carn肉+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.腐肉
champ+ion人→n.冠军,拥护者,战士
cush垫+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.垫子,软垫
manse住宅+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.大厦,大楼;宅第
product产品+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.生产,产品,作品
scorp原意为一种鱼,后指蝎子+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.蝎子
dismiss解散;开除+ion动作或状态等→n.免职,解雇,不予考虑

stems_affixes.value_cn: 允许进入,承认某事之陈述,供认
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+miss送+ion动作或状态等→送来→许可进入
concise简明的+ion动作或状态等→n.简明,简洁
console安慰+at+ion动作或状态等→n.安慰,慰藉
contradict反驳,矛盾+ion动作或状态等→n.反驳,矛盾
create创造+ion动作或状态等→n.创造,创作物
dilapidate倒塌+ion动作或状态等→n.破旧,荒废

stems_affixes.value_cn: 辨别,区别,识别力,辨别力,歧视
stems_affixes.word_buile: discriminate歧视+ion动作或状态等→n.辨别,区别,识别力,辨别力,歧视
discuss讨论+ion动作或状态等→n.讨论,谈论;论述
edit编辑+ion状态→在以前的基础编辑后→版本,版
expanse膨胀扩张+ion动作或状态等→n.扩张,膨胀;张开,伸展
frict摩擦+ion动作或状态等→n.摩擦,摩擦力
lucubrate用功,深入研究+ion动作或状态等→n.刻苦研究

stems_affixes.value_cn: 航海,航空,导航,领航,航行
stems_affixes.word_buile: navigate航行,航海,导航+ion动作或状态等→n.航海,航空,导航,领航,航行
obligate有责任的+ion动作或状态等→n.义务,责任
obsess迷住,使困扰+ion动作或状态等→n.迷住,困扰
pollute弄脏,污染+ion动作或状态等→污染,玷污

stems_affixes.value_cn: 持有,拥有;所有权;所有物;[
stems_affixes.word_buile: possess占有,拥有+ion动作或状态等→n.持有,拥有;所有权;所有物;[n.]财产,财富
receipt收据,收到+ion动作或状态等→n.接待,招待会,接收
situate使处于+ion动作或状态等→n.情形,境遇

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,过程,结果"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上ication.

stems_affixes.word_buile: revoc=revoke废除+ation行为,过程,结果→n.废弃,取消

stems_affixes.value_cn: 结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
stems_affixes.word_buile: combine联合+ation行为,过程,结果→n.结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
confirm证实+ation行为,过程,结果→n.证实,确定;确认
determine决心+ation行为,过程,结果→n.决心;决定;确定
excite使兴奋+ation行为,过程,结果→n.刺激;激动;激发
exclaim叫喊;感叹+ation行为,过程,结果→n.叫喊;感叹
ex出去+plan明白+ation行为,过程,结果→使其明白→解释,解说
generalize一般的+ation行为,过程,结果→n.一般化;概括,综合

stems_affixes.value_cn: 想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: imagine设想+ation行为,过程,结果→n.想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
stems_affixes.word_buile: incline倾斜;偏向+ation行为,过程,结果→n.倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
lament悲伤,哀悼+ation行为,过程,结果→n.悲痛,哀悼,痛哭
limit限制+ation行为,过程,结果→n.限制,局限性
oblige迫使,责成+ation行为,过程,结果→n.义务,责任
present赠送+ation行为,过程,结果→n.介绍;赠送;呈现
provoc=provoke激怒+ation行为,过程,结果→n.激怒
recommend赞扬;推荐+ation行为,过程,结果→n.推荐,介绍[信],劝告,建议
represent描述,表示+ation行为,过程,结果→n.描写;陈述;代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保留意见;预定,预订
stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve保留,储备;预定+ation行为,过程,结果→reservation保留
starve使饿死+ation行为,过程,结果→n.饥饿

Sentence.sentence: With family and career obligations reduced, many said that they had more time for each other.
The state recognizes this in the large body of family laws that govern children' welfare, yet parents receive little help in meeting the life-changing obligations society imposes.
It is regarded as a legal obligation.

means.word_mean: 义务; 责任; 职责

sentences.en: His social obligation compels him to make a round of visits.
sentences.cn: 他的社会职责使得他不得不进行一系列访问。

jushi.english: His social obligation compels him to make a round of visits.
jushi.chinese: 他的社会职责使得他不得不进行一系列访问。

jushi.english: A good citizen has certain obligation to society.
jushi.chinese: 一个好公民对社会有某些义务。
